source.title: Campanulaceae

leads.lead_text: Flowers zygomorphic, more or less 2-lipped or fan-shaped; stamens connate at least for a short distance below anther tube
Flowers actinomorphic, more or less funnel-shaped or rotate; stamens free, anthers not united in a tube
